tr: Press Esc to cancel the test.

en: Hover over an animatronic's name to get their behavior description.
tr: Tap an animatronic name to see a description of its behavior.

en:
Will bust a move if you keep up his groove. If friendly, he will just be 
sad if you let the music stop. If it stops when he's unfriendly, he'll go to 
your office and take your tablet. He will then take it back to his stage
and wind the musicbox for himself.

Appears in front door, will find you under the desk.
tr:
If you keep running, you will stop moving. If you're smart, you'll be 
crazy when you stop singing. If you are an enemy, go to the office and 
get a tablet. Then move to the platform and collect it with the toy box. 

 Go outside and go under the table.

en:
When friendly, he checks your vents for you, blocking any
malicious animatronics from entering that doorway. If he isn't friendly, he'll attack you when he gets into the office.

Appears in any of the 3 vents.
tr:
If you're a friend, he'll guard your door and keep evil dolls out.
You will be attacked when you arrive at the enemy's office.

He will exit through one of three doors.

en:
Hangs out in the kitchen, refills your drink if its empty. When she's
unfriendly, if your drink isn't empty when she comes to refill, she'll kill
you. She will wait for you to get out from under the desk.

Appears in either doorway or the right vent.
tr:
Store in the refrigerator and drink the juice until it cools down. If 
he is in love, your bag is empty; If he fills it, he will kill you. He will wait
until you leave the table.

Go through the door or window to the right.

en:
Very chill guy who just wants to watch you play games on your phone.
He will protect you from another animatronic attack once per night if
he's watching you play while it attacks. When unfriendly, he'll kill you if
your tablet has been taken or has no games installed.

Appears in front door only.
tr:
A handsome man who wants to watch his games on his phone. It will
protect you from accidental attacks when you are playing at night when
you are attacked. If it does not work, you will die. 
Your tablet will not turn on or the game will not work. 

Only visible when you connect.

en:
Aggressive and rude, he ignores Foxy's save. He can be stopped by
hiding under the desk if he's in the front doorway, and by flashing the
flashlight on him in either doorway.

Appears in either doorway.
tr:
angry and defiant. He ignored Fox's defense. You can stop it by hiding under the table.
It is near the entrance and you can stop it when both doors are lit.

It will appear near the entrance.

en:
He gets more aggressive while your tablet is up, as he can hear you.
Can be stopped by hiding under the desk, but can find if you use the
tablet while under the desk. Unaffected by flashlight.

Can appear in either side vent, or the doorway behind you.
tr:
It's even harder if the table is open, because she'll hear you. You can hide under the table,
but if you use the table under the table, you
will be able to see it. It does not affect the light. 

Can be done in side rows or rear doors.

en:
She will simply attack you if she can. She can be stopped by hiding
under the desk, or by flashlight if she's in the ceiling vent.

Appears in either the front door or ceiling vent.
tr:
He will attack you if he can. You can avoid this by hiding it under
a table or using a light in a hole in the ceiling.

Look through the door or ceiling fan.

en:
He gets more aggressive if you don't use CamsPlus, but can be
stopped by a flashlight. He can find you under the desk.

Appears in any entrance.
tr:
In addition to CamsPlus, the included flash is very powerful.
He found you under the table. 
 
 View all files.

en: Enter the code found in BBGSimulator. The code is not case sensitive,and you may put spaces between each code word.
tr: Enter the code into the BBGSCimulator. The code is case sensitive and leaves a space between each code word.

en:
Congratulations!
You're did it!

Just look at
how happy you
are!
Click off of the tablet’s screen to set it down
tr: Click to remove the tablet from the screen

en: Click the Home Button to return to the tablet’s menu
tr: Press the Home button to return to the control panel menu

en: Press or hold [{hide_key}] to hide under your desk\nHold [{flash_key}] to use your flashlight or camera light\nPress [{interact_key}] to interact with objects you're looking at
tr: Last [{hide_key}] or to save the last tab.\nFinish and hold [{flash_key}] to turn on the camera flash or flash.\n[{interact_key}] to edit the list.

en: Play your favorite tunes from your own device, while Freddy Fazbear himself dances along!
tr: Listen to your favorite music on your device while Freddy Fazbear dances!

en: Make Foxy jump up and down between the Brick™ brand ovens! Touching the floor or the ovens will cause Foxy to die. painfully.
tr: Push Fokki up and down between certain brick ovens. If Foxy touches the floor or stove, she dies. Sacrifice

en: Tap the screen to make her go pop! Try for the biggest number!! My high score is 4
tr: Click on the screen to find out! Try to use a lot of numbers!! The maximum level is 5.

en: Navigate your tank through a simple maze to shoot the opponent's tank! Boy, are these tanks causing some trouble. Wait... say that again...
tr: Train your tank to kill enemy tanks with ease. Wow, something is wrong with the box. Don't forget to repeat...

en: Ever wanted to play soccer, but only being able to kick while jumping? Well, now you can! Beat the enemy team!
tr: Are you playing soccer but don't know how to shoot while running? Now you can! Defeat the opposing team!

en: The classic game where thousands of children learned to gamble. Oh, not from us though. From the folks over at Nintendo.
tr: A wonderful game that thousands of children have learned to play. But not from us, but from our friends at Nintendo

en: Turns out, Foxy is quite the artist, and wants to share his art tools with you! Makes sense, I mean, he is a furry after all. You gotta wonder how he can afford so much booty. That, being treasure, you know. (What, is that quote too overdone?)
tr: Foxy is a true artist and loves to share her art with you! It makes sense. This means that there is a lot of hair. You will be surprised how you find these things. This person is property. (Okay, that word is too long, right?)

en: Those bad piggies have taken Chica's cupcake! (Based on a true story!) Help her get it back! (Unfortunately, not based on the true story.)
tr: A real pig stole Chiki's cake! (Of course!) Help him find more! (ah play)

en: Millions of years ago, Bonnie created the concept of trees. (Not really). You play as Stewart, a mouse who wants to get the Cheese from Bonnie, the CEO of Cheese LLC in the year this takes place, 1792.
tr: Millions of years ago, challenges led to the idea of plants. (never). You play as Stuart, who needs cheese from Bonnie, the CEO of 1792 Cheese LLC.

en: A collection of recordings found in the back room of the previous Freddy's location. We don't know who made them, or what they mean. They were found next to the Stringbonnie suit. We believe these stories to be fully fictional.
tr: A collection of documents was found in the hallway of Freddy's old house. Who did it? I don't know what it means. They already understand. Bone Pad Dressing I believe these stories are completely false.

en: Enjoy 5 sensual nights with Freddy and the gang, get to know them intimately, and more~
tr: I spent 5 wonderful nights with Freddy and friends and got to know them.
[color=red]The door is broken\n[color=green]The door is open

en: With your current payment plan, you are only able to close 2 doorways. If you wish to upgrade to the $399/mo plan, please contact jimborinijimborini@gmail.com
tr: You can close 2 accounts using your current payment plan. Contact jimborinijimborini@gmail.com to upgrade for $399 per month

en: One or more modified doors are not responding. Please ensure the doorways are not blocked or jammed, then try again.
tr: If one or more settings are incorrect. Check if the door is locked or unlocked and try again.

en: Please do not close the application.
